description: Jumbo pasta shells packed with herbed ricotta and spinach, baked in marinara and served with a crisp romaine salad.

imagePrompt.base: Vibrant close-up of Spinach & Ricotta Stuffed Shells, plated to showcase vivid textures and color. Incorporate visual cues from this description: Jumbo pasta shells packed with herbed ricotta and spinach, baked in marinara and served with a crisp romaine salad.. Scene: italian-inspired table with soft natural daylight, eye-level perspective, and shallow depth of field. Capture fresh garnish, gentle steam, and a sense of homemade comfort. No people or branded props.
imagePrompt.enhanced: Hero shot: Golden-baked jumbo shells, bursting with creamy herbed ricotta and vibrant spinach, nestled in rich marinara. A glistening blanket of melted mozzarella and Parmesan forms an irresistible crust. Freshly chopped parsley and a crisp romaine salad add vibrant contrast. Bathed in warm, soft natural light, from a slightly elevated, eye-level perspective with shallow depth of field, conveying irresistible homemade comfort.
